required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Johns Hopkins Weight Management Center Patient Data
clinical_study.official_title: Johns Hopkins Weight Management Center Patient Data

lead_sponsor.agency: Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health

clinical_study.source: Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health

brief_summary.textblock: Patient records from Johns Hopkins Weight Management Center historical files

detailed_description.textblock: Examination of historical patient files from the Johns Hopkins Weight Management Center, to be conducted by a study team led by the attending physician and director of the Center. Analyses will examine weight-related outcomes based on participation in the Weight Management Center program.

primary_outcome.description: Weight-related measures for patients of the Johns Hopkins Weight Management Center.

intervention.intervention_name: Behavioral counseling and optional meal replacement program
intervention.description: Medical assessment and medical supervision of weight loss Measurements of metabolism and body composition Individualized exercise programs Personal training Support group meetings Individual psychotherapy A variety of nutritional plans including meal replacement options Nutrition education Long-term weight maintenance and relapse prevention programs

study_pop.textblock: Adults who enroll themselves at the Johns Hopkins Weight Management Center, with the goal of reaching or maintaining a healthy BMI.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- enrolled as a patient at the Johns Hopkins Weight Management Center
Exclusion Criteria:

overall_official.affiliation: Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health
